meanings.definition: A person who serves as a trustee alongside another person.
meanings.sent1: My sister and I are cotrustees of our grandmother's estate.
meanings.sent2: The siblings were appointed as cotrustees for the charity fund.
meanings.sent3: Being a cotrustee with my best friend feels like a fun adventure in responsibility.
meanings.sent4: As cotrustees, they navigate the financial waters together, like sailors on a shared voyage.
meanings.sent5: The concept of a cotrustee is like having a trusty partner in the world of trusteeship.

meanings.definition: To serve as a trustee alongside another person.
meanings.sent1: I will cotrustee with my cousin to manage the property investments.
meanings.sent2: She decided to cotrustee with her colleague for the community project.
meanings.sent3: Let's cotrustee and make sure the funds are in good hands!
meanings.sent4: They cotrustee smoothly, like a well-oiled machine in the world of trust management.
meanings.sent5: To cotrustee effectively, communication and collaboration are key.
